DEPLOYMENT CHECKLIST FOR CPANEL
================================

PRE-DEPLOYMENT
--------------
☐ Run: npm run build
☐ Verify: public/build/manifest.json exists
☐ Check: All .jsx and .tsx files are in manifest
☐ Test locally with production build

CPANEL UPLOAD
-------------
☐ Upload all files except node_modules
☐ Upload public/build/ directory with all assets
☐ Ensure .htaccess is in public/ directory

SERVER SETUP
------------
☐ Point domain to public/ directory
☐ Create/configure .env file
☐ Set APP_ENV=production
☐ Set APP_DEBUG=false
☐ Configure database credentials
☐ Run: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader
☐ Run: chmod -R 755 storage
☐ Run: chmod -R 755 bootstrap/cache
☐ Run: php artisan key:generate (if needed)
☐ Run: php artisan migrate --force
☐ Run: php artisan config:cache
☐ Run: php artisan route:cache
☐ Run: php artisan view:cache
☐ Run: php artisan optimize

VERIFICATION
------------
☐ Visit homepage - should load without errors
☐ Test .jsx pages (Events, Videos, Technology, etc.)
☐ Test .tsx pages (Admin, Dashboard, etc.)
☐ Check browser console for errors
☐ Verify assets are loading from /build/assets/

TROUBLESHOOTING
---------------
If 500 errors occur:
1. Check storage/logs/laravel.log
2. Temporarily set APP_DEBUG=true
3. Clear all caches: php artisan optimize:clear
4. Rebuild: npm run build
5. Re-upload public/build/

CRITICAL FILES CHANGED
----------------------
✓ resources/views/app.blade.php - Removed hardcoded .tsx extension
✓ resources/js/app.tsx - Updated glob pattern to handle .tsx and .jsx
✓ resources/js/ssr.tsx - Updated glob pattern to handle .tsx and .jsx
✓ tsconfig.json - Added .jsx files to include pattern
